 	var delay = "20000";
 	window.onload = function ()
 	{
 		setTimeout(GoToURL, delay);
 	}
 	function GoToURL()
 	{
 		if(typeof IE_fix != "undefined") // IE8 and lower fix to pass the http referer
 		{
 			var referLink = document.createElement("a");
 			referLink.href = url;
 			document.body.appendChild(referLink);
 			referLink.click();
 		}
 		else { window.location.replace(url); } // All other browsers
 	}
   </script>

    <table align="center" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="10" class="sB" width="802">
     <tr>
      <td bgcolor="#FFFFFF" style="padding:0 5px;" valign="top">
       <h1 align="center" class="auto-style1">
       </h1>
       <h1 align="center">
        Welcome to Irelands Farm Cottages
       </h1>
       <p align="center">
       </p>
       <p style="width: 456px">
        Irelands Farm is set in the middle of a working arable farm, in the heart of the
        <strong>
         Warwickshire
        </strong>
        countryside. Enjoy the peace and scenic views, yet still be in striking distance of the National Exhibition Centre, Birmingham International Airport, Stratford upon Avon, Warwick Castle and many other tourist attractions.
       </p>
      </td>
      <td bgcolor="#FFFFFF" style="padding-left:0px;" valign="top">
       <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
        <tr>
         <td align="right" style="padding-right:3px;" valign="right">
          <br/>
          <img src="img/ani.gif"/>
         </td>
        </tr>
       </table>
      </td>
     </tr>
     <tr>
      <td bgcolor="#FFFFFF" colspan="2" style="height: 82px">
       <p align="center">
       </p>
       <p style="width: 772px">
        The
        <strong>
         self-catering cottages
        </strong>
        are all thoughtfully decorated and furnished. They are all fully carpeted, and have gas/oil central heating. They are equipped with microwave, cooker, refrigerator, washing machine, colour television, radio/CD player, electric blankets, duvets and linen. (Please bring your own bath towels, 
 		  as they will be provided for overseas visitors only.)
       </p>
       <p align="center">
       </p>
       <p style="width: 770px">
        Our
        <strong>
         holiday cottages
        </strong>
        are easy to find, just off the A3400.
       </p>
       <p style="width: 770px">
        There is plenty of safe parking adjacent to your cottage when you arrive.
       </p>
       <br/>
       <p align="center" class="style1">
        Minimum stay is for 3 nights from as little as £29/person/night.
        <br/>
        Stay for the full week from £21/person/night.
       </p>
      </td>
     </tr>
